name: Mothballed Armory
description: A military storage facility contains weapons, armor, and military equipment from past conflicts, preserved for future use. The valuable military equipment attracts warriors and collectors, while the dangerous weapons and military security systems create constant hazards.
atmosphere: Footsteps echo through chambers designed to store destruction. Air thick with oiled metal, leather, and violence promise scent. Rows of weapons and armor stand like silent soldiers waiting for war. Skin prickles with presence of military security systems. Taste of metal and old blood fills mouth. Weight of countless weapons and war threat presses down on you.
